edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simplestopwatch.test.android

Class AbstractStopwatchActivityTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simplestopwatch.test.android.AbstractStopwatchActivityTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StopwatchActivityRobolectric

    public abstract class AbstractStopwatchActivityTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract GUI-level test superclass of several essential stopwatch scenarios.
